channel.title: How to add stuff to starting inv and change my stats and add money [Admin]
channel.description: I would like to know how to change every players starting inventory and spawn point. also since i made this server i'd like to be able to change my stats to all 99 and have a good bank. :) anyone know how to do that?

item.title: How to add stuff to starting inv and change my stats and add money [Admin]
item.dc:creator: @chandlerethan chandlerethan
item.description:
@chandlerethan wrote:

what java file would i look in to find the process and initial class?
btw tomscape, that spawning code worked i can spawn any item now and just me! haha

btw, the source made it so only certain people had admin rights, i changed the code so my username would be admin so all i need to know how to do is change my stats.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add stuff to starting inv and change my stats and add money [Admin]
item.dc:creator: @M_And_W M And W
item.description:
@M_And_W wrote:

chandlerethan:

ok so i did what m and w said, and it went back to being character rights 0 after i logged out… and ok ill try that.

I just messed with it when you change it to rights = 3… Sometimes I would save, close out of it, compile it, and it wouldn’t work. But strangely enough, when I saved it like 3 times, kept it open, compiled it, and restarted the client AND server, it worked. Idk why, but it worked for me? Haha.

item.source: How to add stuff to starting inv and change my stats and add money [Admin]

item.title: How to add stuff to starting inv and change my stats and add money [Admin]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

chandlerethan:

sorry i didn’t mention it before. it’s a 317. also, i went into my character file and changed my rights to 3 for admin and clicked save and compile but it didn’t work. i’m pretty sure i can do the starting inventory thing, but how to spawn? i’m old to java but a newborn to private servers. (i play rsps while botting real rs.)

To spawn you do ::pickup ITEMID AMOUNT if you don’t have the command it’s

 if(command.startsWith("item") && playerRights > 1){
		        String[] args = command.split(" ");
	         if(args.length == 3) {
			int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
			if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
				addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
			} else {
				sM("No such item.");
			}
		} else {
			sM("Oops! Use as ::item 995 100");
		}
	    }

For that you do ::item ID AMOUNT

Also, you need to make sure you’re logged out when you’re editing character files, you also don’t need to compile them as they’re text files. The compiled only turns Java code into Java byte code which is then read by the server.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add stuff to starting inv and change my stats and add money [Admin]

item.title: How to add stuff to starting inv and change my stats and add money [Admin]
item.dc:creator: @M_And_W M And W
item.description:
@M_And_W wrote:

chandlerethan:

sorry i didn’t mention it before. it’s a 317. also, i went into my character file and changed my rights to 3 for admin and clicked save and compile but it didn’t work. i’m pretty sure i can do the starting inventory thing, but how to spawn? i’m old to java but a newborn to private servers. (i play rsps while botting real rs.)

I do what you are trying to do every day. ;]

Alright, here’s how to change your rights:

  1. Go into your character file, change to 1-3.
  2. Leave it open! And go to compile it.
  3. Close the panel and “running…” thingy, the “run” in the source file.
  4. Compile it, and run it again.

To add items to your inven:
character-bank = 0 8003 8
character-bank = 1 747 3
character-bank = 2 7809 2
character-bank = 3 527 3
character-bank = 5 668 7
character-bank = 6 36 3
character-bank = 7 2403 4
character-bank = 8 160 1
character-bank = 9 1041 1

Do the same thing. Edit, then compile with this still open, then restart the “run”.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add stuff to starting inv and change my stats and add money [Admin]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

You need to tell us more information, for a 317 delta it would be a ::master command,

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(14000000, i);
}

For a good bank, just spawn everything and copy it onto the character files you want too? it’ll have a [BANK] over the top off it. Also, to change what people have on login depends on whether you have a starter command, check client class, player class etc

Please tell us more information…

Read full topic
